text: A fool and his money are lucky enough to get together in the first place.
author: Stanley Weiser

text: If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently.
author: Placido Domingo

text: I don't mind that I'm fat. You still get the same money.
author: Marlon Brando

text: It's easier to force feed people than it is to give 'em what they want. It makes more money.
author: Merle Haggard

text: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers.
author: Steve Wozniak
